about_the_game:
"Return or No Return" is a first-person horror survival game set in a mansion that traps travelers passing through the infamous shortcut- The Tenebris Tunnel.
After a mysterious smoke sweeps through the car, your friends have disappeared, and you're trapped! You must save them to escape death.

Return or No Return


The Cursed Mansion is home to different forms of mindless beings that will test your sanity and willpower as you explore around endlessly.
After entering the mansion, you find a message by means of riddles, appearing in an old diary that states, "All shall Live or All shall Die till First Sunrise".
You have limited time to find your friends hidden in the cursed manor.

Not just Hide & Seek...


Find the weapon that will keep the claws of death at bay throughout your horror tour.
Explore cautiously, solve puzzles, and fight against nerve-wracking fiends but HIDE when you can...
Master stealth, quick-wits, and speed to escape from this dreadful abode.

name: Return or No Return

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (3.3Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (3.2Ghz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 15063.0 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.2Ghz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (3.6 Ghz)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or INTEL Arc A770
  • DirectX: Version 11

After a mysterious smoke sweeps through the car, your friends have disappeared, and you're trapped! You must save them to escape death.
